fevdid 0.0.0.9000

    Derivations for Frequnecy Domain FEV

    Forecast error variance decomposition.

    fevd.Rd

    Alias for the function from svars::fevd.svars, so that the shock names are correct.

    Usage

    # S3 method for fevdvar
fevd(x, n.ahead = 10, ...)

    Arguments

    x

    SVAR object of class "fevdvar"

    n.ahead

    Integer specifying the steps.

    ...

    Currently not used.

    Value

    Matrix of forecast error variance decomposition in frequency domain Indexed: frequencies, variables, shocks

    Examples

    x <- svars::USA
v <- vars::VAR(x, p = 2)
mvar <- id_fevdtd(v, "pi", 4:10)
vars::fevd(mvar)
#>
